TopicTitle: Greater mass precision readout in editor?

Articles.Content:
None of my mods in the editor allow me to see the mass of a ship in anything but whole numbers. This threw me off a bit when I couldn't get the mass of a vessel to align with what I calculated because the mass fraction for a radial booster assembly was being rounded up so when I multiplied that single mass value by 4 I ended up 3kg heavier than what the engineer report and KER were saying for the complete rocket.

Any mods that I happen to not know of that will get me a mass readout with some decimal places?

Edit: to be clear I know the reason there is no mass precision is because all the parts have whole number masses - the real culprit here is tweakscale
